title: Rich is a keg older today!
content:
P22’s own Richard Kegler is now old enough to drink legally! Well, in dog years, at least :-)

Happy Birthday, Rich!

ChrisL

 [‹ Most excellent lettering linkage](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203190735/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39308 "Go to previous forum topic") [type since 2000 ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203190735/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39222 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dezcom

comments.content:
Happy birthday, Rich! Welcome to the 42 club. :)

T
Well, technically it isn’t today yet here in the pacific time zone, but Happy Birthday tomorrow Rich!! You are a very good man! ;^)

Thanks  
Grazie  
Hvala  
Danke  
Gracias  
!  
But also, please give a shout out to Rudolf Koch who would be 131 today!

131 would need a very loud shout :-)

HAPPY BIRTHDAY RUDY!!!

ChrisL

_131 would need a very loud shout :-)_

HAPPY BIRTHDAY RUDY!!!

Or a medium (maybe even an extra-large)..... ;-)

Have a good one, Rich!
Happy day to both the RKs.

_Or a medium (maybe even an extra-large)..... ;-)_

How about ITC Kabel Ultra combined with Medium? ;-)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203190735im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/koch_bday_6528.jpg)
HBD to Rudolf & to Rich. Both admirable fellows!

Hope you bowl a Turkey you old Kegler!

Happy Birthday Bro!

Stuart :D
Rich Kegler is a good man. I wish him the best.
